CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 16 Since the open circuit voltage V oc of BHJ PSCs is correlated to the difference between the LUMO energy level of the acceptor and HOMO energy level of the donor polymer , 5,17 therefore a higher V oc for PSFDTBT based polymer solar cells is anticipated due to the low - lying HOMO energy level.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ PSCs (Blends of Hole Transporting and Electron Transporting materials in Polymer Solar Cells) |
| PSFDTBT based polymer |
| acceptor polymer |
| donor polymer |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ PSCs (Blends of Hole Transporting and Electron Transporting materials in Polymer Solar Cells) |
| PSFDTBT based polymer |

Paragraph: 16 Since the open circuit voltage V oc of BHJ PSCs is correlated to the difference between the LUMO energy level of the acceptor and HOMO energy level of the donor polymer , 5,17 therefore a higher V oc for PSFDTBT based polymer solar cells is anticipated due to the low - lying HOMO energy level.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| open circuit voltage (V oc) |
| BHJ PSCs |
| LUMO energy level of the acceptor |
| HOMO energy level of the donor polymer |
| PSFDTBT based polymer |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| open circuit voltage (V oc) |
| LUMO energy level of the acceptor |
| HOMO energy level of the donor polymer |

Note: "BHJ PSCs" and "PSFDTBT based polymer" are not material properties, but rather types of polymer solar cells and a specific polymer used in those cells, respectively.
